title: Science Dad: Lessons in Light
description: Science Dad to the rescue! When Tina and Jackson's dad takes them on a camping trip, questions come up, and problems arise, but nothing is too tough for Science Dad! Science Dad: Lessons in Light is an engaging play that introduces students to the concepts of reflection and refraction and how we see them in action in everyday life. The book can also be used to teach students how to identify cause-and-effect relationships as well as identify and use different sentence types.
highFrequencyWords: concentrated, denser, focus, molecules, magnifying glass, reflection, refraction, sanitize, substances
